headline: Is It Too Late To Consider STERIS (STE) After Its Strong 1 Year Share Price Return?
summary: Some investors may be wondering whether STERIS at around US$259.87 is offering good value right now, or if the recent price puts it on the expensive side. The stock has been fairly steady over the last week with a 0.1% decline, while the 1 year return of 26.5% and 5 year return of 44.3% may catch the eye of investors watching longer term performance. Recent attention on STERIS has focused on its role as a healthcare equipment and services provider, and how the market is pricing that exposure...

headline: Reasons to Retain TransMedics Stock in Your Portfolio for Now
summary: TMDX gains momentum as OCS technology, a robust pipeline and strong Q3 results fuel growth, though gross margin pressure tempers the outlook.

headline: Baxter Unveils Dynamo Smart Stretcher to Improve Hospital Safety
summary: BAX introduces its Dynamo Series smart stretcher, aiming to boost hospital safety and reduce patient transfers.
